name: abscn

⊢ (CCfld ∈ NrmGrp → abs ∈(c0[Cn]c1))
⊣ abs =(norm ` CCfld)
⊣ c0 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)
⊣ c1 =(topGen ` ran((,)))

comment: The absolute value function on complex numbers is continuous. (Contributed by NM, 22-Aug-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2014.)
